content:
Who am I? # I’m Tzur, a software developer and a hobbyist game developer. My professional experience consists of 9 years of software development, with many side projects and fun ventures I take on from time to time.
What is this blog about? # I love building new things.
I’ll use this platform to show off my various projects and games, and also perhaps document some hardships and other day-to-day programming challenges I’ll encounter.
Have an interesting project for me to try?
Want some help going forward with your projects?
feel free to contact me on any of the mentioned platforms
title: About

content: Hi everyone! since this is my first blog post, I wanted to write about a cool project that combined two separate areas I love - AI & Game development.
title: Building an AI that plays games
